question: Is the purse clean if Najasat went on it?
answer:
QUESTION

i have a question me and my husband we were together on bed and he discharged in his pant..before going to bathroom he asked me to give him tissue ..he moved the pant a little and place the tissue on the discharge..and then with the same hands he took out his purse from his pocket...to go to toilet so my question is ...

is that purse is unclean or najas..and after fews days i am fasting and my husband use the purse but he said that his hand did not touch the najasa that day and that i think too much..plz replay as soon as possible..because he is till using the purse and he put the purse on bed so should i wash every thing now i am sitting on the place where he kept the purse so should i wash myself and take gusaal..plus as now i am sitting on the bed at that place so my feets are unclean and if i will walk on the floor will i hv to wash to floor also plzz reply

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

Accept the words of your husband, that his hand did not touched impurity and you don’t have to take a bath nor you have to wash any thing.

 

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best  

Ml. Abduz Zaman,
Student Dārul Iftā
